content: Yellowbrow is actually a two-part boss fight, and will include a secondary boss fight in between your first and final encounter with the boss of Chapter 3.

The content is as follows:
Yellowbrow is actually a two-part boss fight, and will include a secondary boss fight in between your first and final encounter with the boss of Chapter 3.
